title: Face-Recognition-using-FaceNet
description: Face recognition system built on a pre-trained FaceNet model, supporting both live and image-based recognition. Trained on celebrity faces with state-of-the-art accuracy.

title: Neural-Networks-from-Scratch
description: Simplest implementation of various neural networks built from scratch to understand core concepts.

title: Human-Violence-Detection
description: Detects violent activity in videos using deep learning techniques.

title: M-OCR
description: A simple and digital way to solve mathematical problems using Optical Character Recognition.

title: CoWIN-Tracker
description: Telegram bot to track the availability of COVID-19 vaccines in India using CoWIN API.

title: COVID19-Tracker-TG-bot
description: Telegram bot for real-time COVID-19 case updates in India.

title: NumWords
description: A simple Python library to convert numbers into their semantic word representation.
